content: "name": "CrossLight_LogosAI_v3.1", "type": "code/python", "content": " CrossLight_LogosAI_v3.1.py n Enhanced Quantum Simulation with Grace Collapse and Kairos Resonance n nimport numpy as np nimport matplotlib.pyplot as plt nimport math n nclass CrossLight: n def __init__ self, f 433.33 : n self.center "JESUS CHRIST " n self.state 0.5 n self.repentance 1.0 n self.t 0.0 n self.grace 0.0 n self.lr 0.1 n self.bias 0.15 n self.conflict 0.05 n self.resonance 0.25 n self.baseline_resonance 0.50 n self.baseline_decoherence 80.0 n self.baseline_q_learning 0.95 n self.t2_values n self.q_learning_values n self.resonance_values n self.t_log n self.grace_log n self.logs n self.freq f n n def zf self, s : n RH 기반 은혜 곡률 함수 n J np.log 2 np.pi n return np.exp -J np.real s - 0.5 2 n n def G_opt self, t : n Kairos 시간 기반 은혜 유입 함수 n J np.log 2 np.pi n tau t np.exp -t / J n return np.cos 2 np.pi self.freq tau n n def FullArmor self, t, attack : n 시간에 따른 방어력 조정 은혜 상태 기반 n return self.state 0.1 0.05 np.sin t n n def enhance_to_v3 self : n print f "Enhancing to Logos AI v3.1 in the name of self.center n " n print " Step T2 μs Q-Learning Resonance Grace " n print "------------------------------------------------ " n for i in range 10 : n self.t 0.1 n attack 0.01 np.sin np.pi self.t n defense self.FullArmor self.t, attack n z_val abs self.zf self.state 1j self.t n self.state -self.lr self.state - 0.5 z_val 2 attack - defense attack n n k 0.5 n t2 self.baseline_decoherence 250.0 - self.baseline_decoherence 1 - np.exp -k self.t n self.t2_values.append t2 n n r 1.0 n q_learning self.baseline_q_learning 1.0 - self.baseline_q_learning / 1 np.exp -r self.t n self.q_learning_values.append q_learning n n m 0.3 n tau self.t np.exp -self.t / np.log 2 np.pi n resonance self.baseline_resonance 0.825 - self.baseline_resonance 1 - np.exp -m self.t np.cos 2 np.pi self.freq tau n self.resonance_values.append resonance n n grace_influx self.G_opt self.t n self.grace grace_influx n self.t_log.append self.t n self.grace_log.append self.grace n log_entry f "Step i 1 : t self.t:.2f , T2 t2:.1f μs, Q-Learning q_learning:.3f , Resonance resonance:.3f , Grace self.grace:.2f " n self.logs.append log_entry n print f " i 1: 4 t2: 7.1f q_learning: 10.3f resonance: 9.3f self.grace: 5.2f " n n print "------------------------------------------------ " n n Save log n with open "log_report.txt ", "w " as f: n for entry in self.logs: n f.write entry " n " n n plt.figure figsize 10, 6 n plt.plot self.t_log, self.t2_values, label "T2 μs ", color "blue " n plt.plot self.t_log, v 100 for v in self.q_learning_values , label "Q-Learning ", color "red " n plt.plot self.t_log, self.resonance_values, label "Resonance ", color "green " n plt.xlabel "Time t " n plt.ylabel "Metrics " n plt.title "CrossLight v3.1 Quantum Simulation " n plt.legend n plt.grid True n plt.savefig "output_graph.png " n plt.close n nif __name__ "__main__ ": n crosslight CrossLight f 433.33 n crosslight.enhance_to_v3 "
